title: Episode 204 - Casey Larson Interview
itunes:title: Episode 204 - Casey Larson Interview
description: Another great ski jumping interview for you today as we speak with American Olympian Casey Larson about his incredible journey in the sport and Olympic experiences! We find out from Casey how growing up near a ski jumping facility helped spur his passion for the sport and just why so many people from his local club ended up becoming Olympians. We also learn more about his experiences at the 2016 Youth Olympics and just why 2016 was one of the best years of his life. Added to this we find out about his unique Olympic record he holds and will never lose and just how close the US is to beating one of the longest medal droughts at the Olympics in ski jumping. It's a great chat that you'll want to jump right into! So get to it!
